des: "Bria brought this onion dip recipe back from a law school graduation in South Carolina. Bria's first time to serve it was when Shawn proposed to Nicolette! This recipes just requires equal parts of all ingredients--very easy if you want to scale it up or down!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Stir sweet onion, mayonnaise, and Cheddar cheese together in an casserole dish.
Bake in preheated oven until golden and bubbly, 15 to 20 minutes.
